ARABIC: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If We had wished We could have sent a warner to every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Had We pleased We could have raised a warner in every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Had We willed, We would have raised up a separate Warner in each habitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had We wanted We could have sent a Prophet to every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: If We willed, We could have sent a Herald of Warning to every village.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And had We willed, We would have raised a warner in every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if We had pleased We would certainly have raised a warner in every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If We had willed, We would have raised up in every city a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If We willed, We could raise up a warner in every village.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If We had so wished, We might have sent a warner into every town,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if We had willed, We would have raised up in each town a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Had We wished, We would have sent a warner to every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Had it been Our Will, We could have sent a warner to every centre of population.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And had We willed, We would have raised a warner in every town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Had it been Our will, We could have raised a warner in every village.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Had We willed, We could have sent to every town a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:51] And had We willed, We could have sent forth in every town a warner, to threaten its inhabitants [with God’s chastisement]; instead We have sent you to the inhabitants of all towns as a warner for your reward to be a great one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If We willed, We could raise up) We could have sent (a warner) a warning messenger (in every village) to the people of every village. Instead, We have sent you to all mankind as a Messenger so that reward and honour will be all yours.
